description: This file defines the DataElementFile class in the WPEFramework::Core namespace, which manages file data elements including file operations such as load, reload, unlink, destroy, and memory mapping. It serves as an abstraction for file handling within the project.

classes.name: DataElementFile
classes.description: A class representing a file data element, providing file management operations in the WPEFramework.

methods.name: DataElementFile()
methods.description: Deleted default constructor to prevent uninitialized instances.

methods.name: operator=(const DataElementFile&)
methods.description: Deleted copy assignment operator to prevent copying.

methods.name: DataElementFile(File& fileName, const uint32_t type)
methods.description: Constructor initializing with a File object and a type identifier.

methods.name: DataElementFile(const string& fileName, const uint32_t mode, const uint32_t requiredSize)
methods.description: Constructor initializing with filename, mode, and optional required size.

methods.name: DataElementFile(const DataElementFile&)
methods.description: Copy constructor.

methods.name: ~DataElementFile()
methods.description: Destructor that ensures the file is closed.

methods.name: Name()
methods.description: Returns the name of the file.

methods.name: IsValid()
methods.description: Checks if the file is currently open.

methods.name: Storage()
methods.description: Provides access to the underlying File object.

methods.name: ErrorCode()
methods.description: Returns the last error code from file operations.

methods.name: ReloadFileInfo()
methods.description: Reloads the file information from the filesystem.

methods.name: User(const string& userName)
methods.description: Retrieves user info associated with the file.

methods.name: Group(const string& groupName)
methods.description: Retrieves group info associated with the file.

methods.name: Permission(uint16_t mode)
methods.description: Sets or retrieves permissions for the file.

methods.name: Unlink()
methods.description: Removes the file from the filesystem if valid.

methods.name: Destroy()
methods.description: Destroys the file and releases resources.

methods.name: Load()
methods.description: Loads the file information into memory.

methods.name: Sync()
methods.description: Synchronizes in-memory state with the file.

methods.name: Close()
methods.description: Closes the file handle.

methods.name: Reallocation(const uint64_t size)
methods.description: Reallocates memory for the file’s data.

methods.name: ReopenMemoryMappedFile()
methods.description: Reopens the memory-mapped version of the file.

methods.name: OpenMemoryMappedFile(uint32_t requiredSize)
methods.description: Opens or creates a memory-mapped file with specified size.

methods.name: bool Destroy()
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: uint32_t ErrorCode() const
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: uint32_t Group(const string & groupName) const
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: bool IsValid() const
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: const string & Name() const
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: uint32_t Permission(uint16_t mode) const
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: void ReloadFileInfo() const
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: const File & Storage() const
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: bool Unlink()
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: uint32_t User(const string & userName) const
methods.description: unavailable

ctags.name: Group
ctags.pattern: /^        inline uint32_t Group(const string& groupName) const$/

ctags.name: User
ctags.pattern: /^        inline uint32_t User(const string& userName) const$/
